doc.title: Last Chance Romance
doc.plot: Last Chance Romance is a window into the realm of the nearly departed. It plunges the viewer into the passage of time between the twilight years and the Great Beyond. Set on the lonesome salt marshes of Norfolk, England, an elderly woman sweeps the ever-present dust outside her caravan while her dreams of release go unfulfilled. Her efforts are rewarded when two impeccably attired lotharios appear at her door offering the deal of a lifetime...a subscription to Last Chance Romance Magazine. Journey through the twilight of every man's life. The dreams that sustain us, the fortunes that find us, and the images that ultimately define us. Last Chance Romance transports you to the future of our existence, and the eternal question -What lies beyond?
